text: Edouard Mathos (June 28, 1948 - April 28, 2017) was a Roman Catholic bishop. Ordained to the priesthood in 1977, Mathos served as auxiliary of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Bossangoa, Central African Republic from 1987 to 1991. He then served as auxiliary bishop of Bangui from 1991 to 2004. Mathos then served as bishop of the Diocese of Bambari from 2004 until his death in 2017.Diocese of Bambari ==Notes== Category:1948 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Central African Republic Roman Catholic bishops
title: Edouard Mathos
